title: Blockchain Forensics: Following the Money
description: Learn Blockchain Forensics: Following the Money in one minute.

hook.text: Criminals thought Bitcoin was untraceable. Then a company called Chainalysis proved them spectacularly wrong.

buildup.text: Blockchain forensics firms analyze transaction patterns, cluster addresses, and link wallets to real-world identities.

discovery.text: Every Bitcoin transaction is permanently recorded. Given enough data and time, analysts can trace funds through.

climax.text: Bitcoin's permanent public ledger, once criminals' friend, became law enforcement's most powerful tool.
